item.description:
ISN proudly presents Beach Party!
***LIMITED EARLY BIRD TICKETS ON SALE!! GET THEM NOW!!***
Summer. Bright colors. Flora. And the BEACH!

Join us in welcoming the Summer with a Bang!

ISN- Boston invites you to an exclusive Beach-themed party. Take out those floral prints and those hot pinks. Enjoy cool Salsa lessons and/or Learn "How to make a Drink" (and of course, drink it away with glory!)

======================================
Friday- May 10th, 2013
Doors open at 9:00 pm
Salsa Lessons 9:15 pm
Mixology featuring "How to make a Sex on the Beach" 10:15 pm
We dance until 2 am!
=====================================
At
Mojitos Boston
48 Winter Street
Boston, MA 02108

=====================================
Please purchase tickets here: http://isnbeachparty2013.eventbrite.com/
=====================================

Join ISN- Boston: www.facebook.com/ISN.Boston

ISN: International Students' Network- Boston
Exclusively for chic internationals
item.name: Beach Party!
